list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a person or thing that prevents incompatible or antagonistic people or things from coming into contact with or harming each other.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: family and friends can provide a buffer against stress
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Gia đình và bạn bè có thể cung cấp một bộ đệm chống lại căng thẳng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a solution that resists changes in pH when acid or alkali is added to it. Buffers typically involve a weak acid or alkali together with one of its salts.
lessen or moderate the impact of (something).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the massage helped to buffer the strain
